title: cmd/godoc: handle $GOPATH automatically, delete -path
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. godoc -path=. bencode

What is the expected output?

Documentation for my package.

What do you see instead?

2011/12/22 15:17:31 open /home/joiner/src/go/src/pkg/bencode: no such file or directory

Which revision are you using?

b4e4cd40f394+ tip

Please provide any additional information below.

Patch attached.
Attachments: 1. godoc-paths-command-line-mode.patch (297 bytes)
